feed.title: A summary list of all concerns related to not rising the block size

entry.title: A summary list of all concerns related to not rising the block size
entry.summary: Jorge Tim√≥n shared his personal lists of arguments on both sides of the block size debate to remain objective. He posted an updated version of his list, which can be found at http://0bin.net/paste/igHZMgeoIbYjCJd9#ovaOUlSAKvQYT2p3VXuIuUmNk2XyLH-GnjR5NZMZgFb. Inspired by this idea, a website was created to list all the strongest arguments and counterarguments regarding the block size debate in a detailed manner. The site, https://sites.google.com/site/bitcoinblocksizedebate/, invites feedback from users.
